school_tradition: Media theory, Toronto School of communication theory
notable_ideas: The medium is the message, global village (term)
influences: Giambattista Vico, Harold Innis, Eric A. Havelock, Thomas Nashe, G. K. Chesterton, I. A. Richards, F. R. Leavis, James Joyce, Marcel Duchamp, Moses Hadas
influenced: Walter J. Ong, Abbie Hoffman, Neil Postman, Timothy Leary, Camille Paglia, Terence McKenna, Wired (magazine), William Irwin Thompson, Paul Levinson, Douglas Rushkoff, B.W. Powe, Jean Baudrillard, Norbert Bolz
